dropped-item-tweaks.static-dropped-items: Remove the bobbing of items dropped on the ground.
dropped-item-tweaks.dropped-stack-item-c: The max amount of dropped items to render. This does not scale like vanilla. Set to 0 to disable.
dropped-item-tweaks.uhc-overlay.descript:
Custom scale for apples, gapples, gold, golden nuggets, and player heads.

Set to 0 to disable!
